version_description:
This update brings a fresh new coat of paint to the whole app bringing more of the new DeviantArt style to the app.

What's New:
- Colors, fonts, and general design elements throughout the app have been updated.
- Watch Feed is now called â€œFol
This update fixes an issue where deviants could not scroll through their gallery or favourites.
This update enables deviants to open profiles via the avatar and username on deviation pages.
This update enables deviants to open profiles via the avatar and username on deviation pages.
This update includes several bug fixes and other improvements.

The DeviantArt app has been updated to include a redesigned Home with two tabs for your browsing needs: Following and Recommended For You.

- Following shows deviations from deviants you watch.
- Recommended For You helps you discover content re
The new posts feed lets you explore journals and status updates from deviants you follow.

- The new posts feed lets you explore journals and status updates from deviants you follow
- Explore gets a new look, with easy-to-access topics and Daily Deviations across the top
- Search now includes deviants so you can easily find your favorite

- Watchers-only galleries can now be unlocked in the app
- Improvements to Daily Deviations, including a new section on the top of Explore
- Share a post directly from the posts feed
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements
